headline: Reliability Roadmap by the Numbers: 2,700 Electric Reliability Improvements Powered by Customers' Investments in 2025
summary: Consumers Energy is looking back on a year of major grid improvements as crews across Michigan completed thousands of projects in 2025 to strengthen the electric system, reducing outages, restoring power faster and helping control costs for customers. These upgrades reflect our commitment to investing customers' dollars wisely in work that improves their experience even as severe weather intensified statewide.

headline: How to Maximize Your Retirement Portfolio with These Top-Ranked Dividend Stocks
summary: The traditional ways to plan for your retirement may mean income can no longer cover expenses post-employment. But what if there was another option that could provide a steady, reliable source of income in your nest egg years?
